# Wondrous Absence (WondArch)
## Overview
**Wondrous Absence:** This conceals all magical auras in a single stronghold space. This works like *[[Magic Aura (Spell)|magic aura]]**.*

*Caster Level:* 3rd; Prerequisites: [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], *[[Magic Aura (Spell)|magic aura]]**; Market Price:* 3,000 gp.

**Source:** Stronghold Builders Guidebook (WotC), pg. 86
